html_body.description: The html body of the comment

is_private.description: The public status of the comment

creator_type.description: The creator type of the comment. Authorized values are either USER or CONTACT

ticket_id.description: The uuid of the ticket the comment is tied to

contact_id.description: The uuid of the contact which the comment belongs to (if no user_id specified)

user_id.description: The uuid of the user which the comment belongs to (if no contact_id specified)

attachments.description: The attachements uuids tied to the comment

status.description: The status of the ticket. Authorized values are OPEN or CLOSED.

due_date.description: The date the ticket is due

type.description: The type of the ticket. Authorized values are PROBLEM, QUESTION, or TASK

parent_ticket.description: The uuid of the parent ticket

project_id.description: The uuid of the collection (project) the ticket belongs to

tags.description: The tags names of the ticket

completed_at.description: The date the ticket has been completed

priority.description: The priority of the ticket. Authorized values are HIGH, MEDIUM or LOW.

assigned_to.description: The users uuids the ticket is assigned to

account_id.description: The uuid of the account which the ticket belongs to

contact_id.description: The uuid of the contact which the ticket belongs to

remote_id.description: The id of the ticket in the context of the 3rd Party

status.description: The status of the ticket. Authorized values are OPEN or CLOSED.

due_date.description: The date the ticket is due

type.description: The type of the ticket. Authorized values are PROBLEM, QUESTION, or TASK

parent_ticket.description: The uuid of the parent ticket

project_id.description: The uuid of the collection (project) the ticket belongs to

tags.description: The tags names of the ticket

completed_at.description: The date the ticket has been completed

priority.description: The priority of the ticket. Authorized values are HIGH, MEDIUM or LOW.

assigned_to.description: The users uuids the ticket is assigned to

account_id.description: The uuid of the account which the ticket belongs to

contact_id.description: The uuid of the contact which the ticket belongs to

email_address_type.description: The email address type. Authorized values are either PERSONAL or WORK.

owner_type.description: The owner type of an email

address_type.description: The address type. Authorized values are either PERSONAL or WORK.

owner_type.description: The owner type of the address

phone_number.description: The phone number starting with a plus (+) followed by the country code (e.g +336676778890 for France)

phone_type.description: The phone type. Authorized values are either MOBILE or WORK

owner_type.description: The owner type of a phone number

user_id.description: The uuid of the user who is on the deal

stage_id.description: The uuid of the stage of the deal

company_id.description: The uuid of the company tied to the deal

remote_id.description: The id of the deal in the context of the Crm 3rd Party

user_id.description: The uuid of the user who is on the deal

stage_id.description: The uuid of the stage of the deal

company_id.description: The uuid of the company tied to the deal

direction.description: The direction of the engagement. Authorized values are INBOUND or OUTBOUND

start_at.description: The start time of the engagement

end_time.description: The end time of the engagement

type.description: The type of the engagement. Authorized values are EMAIL, CALL or MEETING

user_id.description: The uuid of the user tied to the engagement

company_id.description: The uuid of the company tied to the engagement

contacts.description: The uuids of contacts tied to the engagement object

remote_id.description: The id of the engagement in the context of the Crm 3rd Party

direction.description: The direction of the engagement. Authorized values are INBOUND or OUTBOUND

start_at.description: The start time of the engagement

end_time.description: The end time of the engagement

type.description: The type of the engagement. Authorized values are EMAIL, CALL or MEETING

user_id.description: The uuid of the user tied to the engagement

company_id.description: The uuid of the company tied to the engagement

user_id.description: The uuid of the user tied the note

company_id.description: The uuid of the company tied to the note

contact_id.description: The uuid fo the contact tied to the note

deal_id.description: The uuid of the deal tied to the note
